Example of a Particular Class: ALS 11.0.1.2 RSoXS Loader¶

class PyHyperScattering.load.ALS11012RSoXSLoader(corr_mode=None, user_corr_func=None, dark_pedestal=0, exposure_offset=0.002)¶
file_ext = '(.*?).fits'¶
loadDarks(basepath, dark_base_name)¶
loadSampleSpecificDarks(basepath, file_filter='', file_skip='donotskip', md_filter={})¶

load darks matching a specific sample metadata

@param basepath: path to load darks from

@param file_filter: string that must be in each file name

@param file_skip: string that, if in file name, means file should be skipped.

@param md_filter: dict of required metadata values. this will be appended with dark images only, no need to put that here.

loadSingleImage(filepath, coords=None)¶
